content.rendered:
Frozen taro strip are vacuum packed, taro are shredded into big fibers that can be about 10cm in size, about 3-5mm in thickness or depending on customers’ requirements. taro strip are often used for frying, stir-frying or spring rolls…

The process of preparing frozen taro strip is like the process of making Frozen taro half cut.

Taro half cut after washing

Taro are shredded by machine, the size of the potato is about 10cm in length and 3-5mm in thickness

Taro shredded

Taro strip are vacuum packed in 500g, 1kg per bag

excerpt.rendered: Frozen taro strip are vacuum packed, taro are shredded into big fibers that can be about 10cm in size, about…
